Object Shape: Blimp, Chevron, Circle, Disc, Fireball, Oval, Sphere
Summary: Glowing orb seen over Dartmouth NS
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Dartmouth
There were no other sightings in Dartmouth on or around October 26th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThe orb caught my eye as we were leaving Dartmouth Crossing in Dartmouth, NS. We continued to observe the object as we traveled Hwy 118 south to Hwy 111. It was also witnessed by my husband and children. The object appeared to be moving very slowly, maybe even hovering, although it was hard to tell because we were moving as well. We thought it might have been a comet, but after a few moments, we thought it wasn't moving fast enough. We lost sight of it shortly after exiting onto the 111.
